samhita: Sundha#ddhvaqM daivyA#yaq karma#NE dEvayaqjyAyai# mAtaqriSva#nO GaqrmO#&siq dyaura#si pRuthiqvya#si viqSvadhA#yA asi paraqmENaq dhAmnAq dRu(gm)ha#svaq mA hvAqr vasU#nAM paqvitra#masi SaqtadhA#raqM ~MvasU#nAM paqvitra#masi saqhasra#dhAra(gm) huqtaH stOqkOhuqtO draqPsO$ &gnayE# bRuhaqtE nAkA#yaq svAhAq dyAvA#pRuthiqvIByAq(gm)q sA viqSvAyuqH sA viqSvavya#cAqH sA viqSvaka#rmAq saM pRu#cyaddhva-mRutAvarI-rUqrmiNIqrmadhu#mattamA maqndrA dhana#sya sAqtayEq sOmE#naq tvA&&ta#naqcmIndrA#yaq dadhiq viShNO# haqvya(gm) ra#kShasva
